project_plan.name: Weather Fetching Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the command-line interface to input a city name
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API integration and data parsing
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
